DOC.brief_summary: The t-VNS STv3 device is a non-invasive, transcutaneous neurostimulator for influencing the afferent branches of the nervus vagus around the human ear. The clinical trial is designed as a a pilot study addressing the treatment of tinnitus with transcutaneous vagus nerve stimulation.
DOC.brief_title: The Treatment of Tinnitus With Transcutaneous Non-invasive Vagus Nerve Stimulation
